trans-unit.target: forceGet 是布尔值和可选的。

trans-unit.source: location = location for maximum use of the cache, as long as the page doesn't have a hash in its URL, in which case this won't work
trans-unit.target: location = location 最大限度地利用高速缓存的位置，只要页面的URL中没有哈希，在这种情况下将无法使用

trans-unit.source: location.reload() to faithfully reproduce the effect of the user clicking the 'refresh' button.
trans-unit.target: location.reload() 忠实地再现用户单击“刷新”按钮的效果。

trans-unit.source: location.reload(true) to fetch new copies of all resources without revalidating (although it's not universally supported and will behave no differently to location.reload() in some browsers, like Chrome)
trans-unit.target: location.reload(true) ，无需重新验证即可获取所有资源的新副本（尽管不受普遍支持，并且在某些浏览器（例如Chrome）中，其行为与 location.reload() 相同）

trans-unit.source: window.location.reload() will reload from the server and will load all your data, scripts, images, etc. again.
trans-unit.target: window.location.reload() 将从服务器重新加载，并再次加载所有数据，脚本，图像等。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the user doing a "hard reload" in browsers where that's possible.

trans-unit.source: Exactly how the browser should utilise its cache when performing a location.reload() call isn't specified or documented as far as I can tell; I determined the behaviour above by experimentation.

trans-unit.source: Here is a solution that asynchronously reloads a page using jQuery. It avoids the flicker caused by window.location = window.location. This example shows a page that reloads continuously, as in a dashboard. It is battle-tested and is running on an information display TV in Times Square.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个使用jQuery异步重新加载页面的解决方案。它避免了 window.location = window.location 引起的闪烁。本示例显示了一个页面，该页面如仪表板一样不断重新加载。它经过了实战测试，并在时代广场的信息显示电视上运行。

trans-unit.source: If you are using jQuery and want to refresh, then try adding your jQuery in a javascript function:
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是jQuery,想要刷新,那么可以尝试在javascript函数中添加你的jQuery。

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to do force reload the page, just pass a true value to reload method like below...
trans-unit.target: 如果您想强制重新加载页面，只需将一个真值传递给reload方法，如下所示...

trans-unit.source: In browsers that implement the forcedReload parameter of location.reload(), reloads by fetching a fresh copy of the page and all of its resources (scripts, stylesheets, images, etc.). Will not serve any resources from the cache - gets fresh copies from the server without sending any if-modified-since or if-none-match headers in the request.
trans-unit.target: 在实现 location.reload() 的 forcedReload 参数的浏览器中，通过获取页​​面及其所有资源（脚本，样式表，图像等）的新副本进行重新加载。不会从缓存中提供任何资源-从服务器获取新副本，而不在请求中发送任何 if-modified-since 或 if-none-match 头。

trans-unit.source: In unsupporting browsers, like Google Chrome, location.reload(true) behaves the same as location.reload().
trans-unit.target: 在不支持的浏览器（例如Google Chrome）中， location.reload(true) 的行为与 location.reload() 相同。

trans-unit.source: It is shortest in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 在JavaScript中,它是最短的。

trans-unit.source: It uses the jQuery wrapper and extracts the native dom element.
trans-unit.target: 它使用jQuery包装器并提取原生dom元素。

trans-unit.source: Just pick from 1 to 10 that suits your needs or add some more based on the pattern and answers before this.
trans-unit.target: 只要从1到10个中挑选出适合自己需要的,或者根据前面的模式和答案再增加一些就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Lots of ways will work, I suppose:
trans-unit.target: 我想,很多方法都会成功的。

trans-unit.source: Mixing plain Jane javascript with your jQuery should work.
trans-unit.target: 将普通的javascript和你的javascript混合在一起,应该是可行的。

trans-unit.source: Note that passing true to location.reload() is supported in Firefox (see MDN) and Internet Explorer (see MSDN) but is not supported universally and is not part of the W3 HTML 5 spec, nor the W3 draft HTML 5.1 spec, nor the WHATWG HTML Living Standard.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在Firefox（请参阅MDN）和Internet Explorer（请参阅MSDN）中支持将 true 传递给 location.reload() ,但它不受普遍支持，也不属于W3 HTML 5规范，W3草案HTML 5.1规范和WHATWG HTML生活标准。

trans-unit.source: Notes:
trans-unit.target: Notes:

trans-unit.source: Only works if the page's URL doesn't contain a fragid/hashbang!
trans-unit.target: 只有当页面的URL不包含fragidhashbang!

trans-unit.source: Or just
trans-unit.target: 或者只是

trans-unit.source: Probably shortest (12 chars) - use history
trans-unit.target: 可能最短（12个字符）-使用历史记录

trans-unit.source: Reloads the page without refetching or revalidating anyfresh resources from the cache. If the page's HTML itself is fresh, this will reload the page without performing any HTTP requests at all.
trans-unit.target: 重新加载页面，而无需重新获取或重新验证缓存中的任何新资源。如果页面的HTML本身是最新的，这将重新加载页面而不执行任何HTTP请求。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the page, fetching a fresh, non-cached copy of the page HTML itself, and performing RFC 7234 revalidation requests for any resources (like scripts) that the browser has cached, even if they are fresh are RFC 7234 permits the browser to serve them without revalidation.
trans-unit.target: 重新加载页面，获取页面HTML本身的最新非缓存副本，并对浏览器已缓存的任何资源（例如脚本）执行RFC 7234重新验证请求，即使它们是新鲜的，RFC 7234仍允许浏览器提供服务他们没有重新验证。

trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to true if you want to force the browser to get the page from the server to get rid of the cache as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想强制浏览器从服务器上获取页面,以去除缓存,则将此参数设置为true。

trans-unit.source: So if you just want to refresh the HTML, the window.location = document.URL will return much quicker and with less traffic. But it will not reload the page if there is a hash (#) in the URL.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您只想刷新HTML，则 window.location = document.URL 将返回得更快，访问量也更少。但是，如果URL中包含井号（＃），它将不会重新加载页面。

trans-unit.source: So you'll understand that the foundation of jquery, or jquery is based on javascript. So going with pure javascript is way better when it comes to simple things.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您将了解jquery或jquery的基础是基于javascript的。因此，对于简单的事情，使用纯JavaScript会更好。

trans-unit.source: So, in summary, you want to use:
trans-unit.target: 所以,综上所述,你要用。

trans-unit.source: Solution1: Force reloading the current page from the server
trans-unit.target: 解决方案1：强制从服务器重新加载当前页面

trans-unit.source: Solution2: Reloading from cache or server (based on browser and your config)
trans-unit.target: 解决方案2：从缓存或服务器重新加载（基于浏览器和您的配置）

trans-unit.source: The reload() function takes an optional parameter that can be set to true to force a reload from the server rather than the cache. The parameter defaults to false, so by default the page may reload from the browser's cache.
trans-unit.target: 在 reload() 函数将可以设置为可选参数， true 从服务器而不是缓存强制重新加载。该参数默认为 false ，因此默认情况下该页面可能会从浏览器的缓存中重新加载。

trans-unit.source: The Location.reload() method reloads the resource from the current URL. Its optional unique parameter is a Boolean, which, when it is true, causes the page to always be reloaded from the server. If it is false or not specified, the browser may reload the page from its cache.
trans-unit.target: Location.reload()方法从当前的URL重新加载资源。它的可选唯一参数是一个布尔值,当它为真时,会导致页面总是从服务器上重新加载。如果它是false或未指定,浏览器可能会从缓存中重新加载页面。

trans-unit.source: The approach here that I used was Ajax jQuery. I tested it on Chrome 13. Then I put the code in the handler that will trigger the reload. The URL is "", which means this page.
trans-unit.target: 我在这里使用的方法是Ajax jQuery。我在Chrome 13 上进行了测试。然后将代码放入处理程序中，该处理程序将触发重新加载。该URL是 "" ，这意味着这个页面。

trans-unit.source: The default is false which reloads the page from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 默认为false,会从缓存中重新加载页面。

trans-unit.target: 最简单的方法是以适当的方式放置一条线的解决方案。

trans-unit.target: jQuery Load 函数还可以执行页面刷新：

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to reload the current pages, but somehow using those approaches you can see page updated but not with few cache values will be there, so overcome that issue or if you wish to make hard requests then use the below code.
trans-unit.target: 有很多方法来重新加载当前页面,但不知怎么使用这些方法,你可以看到页面更新,但没有几个缓存值会有,所以克服这个问题,或者如果你想提出硬性要求,那么使用下面的代码。

trans-unit.source: This approach probably leaks memory somehow, the http-equiv refresh fixes that
trans-unit.target: 这种方法可能会以某种方式泄漏内存， http-equiv 刷新修复了

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent (from a caching perspective) to the user opening the page in a new tab.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于(从缓存的角度来看)用户在一个新的标签页中打开页面。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the user simply pressing the "refresh" button in their browser.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于用户只需在浏览器中按下 "刷新 "按钮即可。

trans-unit.source: This makes it very much easier to reload the page removing any hash. This is very nice when I am using AngularJS in the iOS simulator, so that I don't have to rerun the app.
trans-unit.target: 这使得重新加载页面删除任何哈希后的页面变得非常容易。当我在iOS模拟器中使用AngularJS时,这一点非常好,这样我就不用重新运行应用了。

trans-unit.source: This means there are two ways:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着有两种方式。

trans-unit.source: This should work on all browsers even without jQuery:
trans-unit.target: 这应该可以在所有的浏览器上工作,即使没有jQuery也可以。

trans-unit.source: Three approaches with different cache-related behaviours:
trans-unit.target: 三种方法,有不同的缓存相关行为。

trans-unit.source: To reload a page with jQuery, do:
trans-unit.target: 要用jQuery重新加载一个页面,请这样做。

trans-unit.source: Use location.reload():
trans-unit.target: 使用 location.reload() ：

trans-unit.source: Use http-equiv="refresh" just in case something goes wrong with javascript/server hiccup, then the page will STILL reload without you getting a phone call
trans-unit.target: 如果javascript / server打ref出现问题，请使用 http-equiv="refresh" ，然后页面仍会重新加载，而您不会接到电话

trans-unit.source: Use onclick="return location.reload();" within the button tag.
trans-unit.target: 使用 onclick="return location.reload();" 在按钮标签内。

trans-unit.source: Use this if you just want a jQuery feeling on your code and you don't care about speed/performance of the code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想在代码上使用jQuery，并且不关心代码的速度/性能，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Using $.ajax directly like $.get('',function(data){$(document.body).html(data)})causes css/js files to get cache-busted, even if you use cache: true, that's why we use parseHTML
trans-unit.target: 直接使用 $.ajax 就像 $.get('',function(data){$(document.body).html(data)}) ，即使您使用 cache: true ，css / js文件也会被缓存破坏。这就是为什么我们使用 parseHTML

trans-unit.source: Using jquery
trans-unit.target: 使用jquery

trans-unit.source: What many people are missing here, because they hope to get some "points" is that the reload() function itself offers a Boolean as a parameter (details: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Location/reload).
trans-unit.target: 许多人在这里缺少的是，因为他们希望得到一些“要点”，因为reload（）函数本身提供了布尔值作为参数（详细信息：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web / API / Location / reload）。

trans-unit.source: With default/ false parameter
trans-unit.target: 使用 default / false 参数

trans-unit.source: With true parameter
trans-unit.target: 具有 true 参数

trans-unit.source: You don't need anything from jQuery, to reload a page using pure JavaScript, just use reload function on location property like this:
trans-unit.target: 您不需要 jQuery的任何东西，就可以使用纯JavaScript重新加载页面，只需对location属性使用reload函数，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: You can continue the list being creative:
trans-unit.target: 你可以继续列表是有创意的。

trans-unit.source: You can use JavaScriptlocation.reload() method. This method accepts a boolean parameter. true or false. If the parameter is true; the page always reloaded from the server. If it is false; which is the default or with empty parameter browser reload the page from it's cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 JavaScript location.reload() 方法。此方法接受布尔参数。 true 或 false 。如果参数为 true ; 该页面始终从服务器重新加载。如果是 false ; 这是默认值或带有空参数的浏览器会从缓存中重新加载页面。

trans-unit.source: You can write it in two ways. 1st is the standard way of reloading the page also called as simple refresh
trans-unit.target: 您可以用两种方式编写它。第一种是重新加载页面的标准方法，也称为简单刷新

trans-unit.target: 你可能想用

trans-unit.source: also makes a page refresh.
trans-unit.target: 也使页面刷新。

trans-unit.target: 因为 window.location.reload() 如果在由POST请求加载的页面上被调用，将提示您进行确认。

trans-unit.target: 如果你想快速、简单地使用缓存。

trans-unit.target: 而不是
